properties.description: This dataflow processes internet order blobs from the storage account to DQ

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		orderid as integer,
		orderdate as string,
		customer as integer,
		product as integer,
		units as integer,
		billingaddress as string,
		remarks as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrdersInputSource
source(output(
		customerid as integer,
		fullname as string,
		address as string,
		credit as integer,
		status as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customers
source(output(
		itemdiscount as short,
		productid as short,
		title as string,
		unitprice as short,
		unitsinstock as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> Products
source(output(
		CityId as integer,
		CityName as string,
		Region as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CapitalCities
OrdersInputSource, Customers join(customer == customerid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'right')~> OrderAndCustomers
OrderAndCustomers, Products join(product == productid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'right')~> OrdersCustomersProductsOutput
OrdersCustomersProductsOutput, CapitalCities join(address == CityName,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'right')~> OrderJoinedOutput
OrderJoinedOutput select(mapColumn(
		orderid,
		orderdate,
		units,
		billingaddress,
		fullname,
		customerlocation = address,
		credit,
		status,
		itemdiscount,
		title,
		unitprice,
		unitsinstock,
		Region
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumns
SelectedColumns derive(orderamount = units * unitprice,
		discountamount = toInteger(units * unitprice * itemdiscount * 0.01),
		customertype = iif(credit<1000, "silver", iif(credit>=1000 && credit <10000,"Gold","Platinum")),
		activestatus = iif(status,"Active","InACtive")) ~> PrepareColumns
PrepareColumns select(mapColumn(
		orderid,
		orderdate,
		units,
		billingaddress,
		fullname,
		customerlocation,
		title,
		unitprice,
		unitsinstock,
		Region,
		orderamount,
		discountamount,
		customertype,
		activestatus,
		credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CleansedOrders
CleansedOrders filter(credit >= orderamount && unitsinstock >= units && activestatus=='Active') ~> ProcessedOrders
